title: BONUS: Unpacking House of Hammer (Discovery+) with Casey Hammer
itunes:title: BONUS: Unpacking House of Hammer (Discovery+) with Casey Hammer
description:
House of Hammer is a documentary series airing on Discovery+ September 2 about actor Armie Hammer and the Hammer family dynasty. One of the family members who appears in the documentary, Casey Hammer, stops by Everything Iconic for a bonus episode to talk about her experience with the family legacy, the abuse, the money/power struggle she witnessed, and so much more!


*Please note that this episode includes very frank discussions of abuse.


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
